author: nftdao
title: Decentralized Content Distribution
description: Content creators in the LATAM region have difficulties distributing and monetizing their content.
solution: A platform for content creators where they can distribute their creations using NFTs and receive payments over the Cardano blockchain.
experience:
Plutus Pioneer cohort 1, EMURGO academy certification, MIT 2018 Brazil Entrepenurship Bootcamp alumni. 
Plus all the resources of NFT-DAO.
